Summary._: Southbound [D] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Kingsbridge Rd.

Description._: Southbound [D] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Kingsbridge Rd.

LongDescription:
Southbound [D] trains are running with delays because of signal problems at Kingsbridge Rd.

Maintainers are on the scene making repairs.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 5 - 6, Thu  and  Fri, 1045 AM to 330 PM Uptown [2] [5]

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 5 - 6, Thu  and  Fri, 1045 AM to 330 PM Uptown [2] [5]

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 5 - 6, Thu and Fri, 10:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Uptown [2] [5] trains run express from 3 Av-149 St to E 180 St in Manhattan


For service to Jackson, Prospect, Intervale Avs, Simpson, Freeman, 174 Sts and E Tremont Av,
take the [2] or [5] to E 180 St and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2] or [5].

For service from these stations, take the [2] or [5] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to an
uptown [2] or [5].

Alternate travel note:
For service to Jackson, Prospect, Intervale Avs and Simpson St, transfer to the Bx4 bus at 3 Av-149 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 3 - 6, Tue to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Pelham Bay Park-bound [6] trains run express from Parkchester to Pelham Bay Park in the Bronx


For service to Castle Hill, Zerega Avs, Westchester Sq, Middletown Rd and Buhre Av, take the [6] to Pelham Bay Park and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].

For service from these stations, take the [6] to Parkchester and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

Alternate travel note:
For service from Westchester Sq, Middletown Rd and Buhre Av, take the Bx24 bus.

Summary._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

Description._: ROCKAWAYS FLOOD PROTECTION  Until September 3, 2018 No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel

LongDescription:
ROCKAWAYS: FLOOD PROTECTION | Until September 3, 2018
No [A] trains running to Far Rockaway-Mott Av
No [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel


[A] trains run between Inwood-207 St, Manhattan and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St, Queens.

The [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle runs, approximately every 15 minutes, between Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Far Rockaway-Mott Av service, take the [S] instead, transfer at Beach 90 St.

For Broad Channel [S] shuttle customers, take the [A] instead.

[ad1] For an accessible connection between the [A] train and [S] shuttle trains, transfer at Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 3 - 6, Tue to Fri

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 3 - 6, Tue to Fri

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 3 - 6, Tue to Fri • Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
145 St-bound [B] trains run local from Sheepshead Bay to Prospect Park in Brooklyn

TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 2 - 6 • Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, beginning 10 AM each day
Broad St-bound [J] trains make local stops at Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St in Brooklyn


Broad St-bound express service ends early.

TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 2 - 6 • Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Jamaica Center-bound [J] and Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a
Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a
Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Middle Village-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Marcy Av or Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 3 - 6, Tue to Fri

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  Jul 3 - 6, Tue to Fri

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT | Jul 3 - 6, Tue to Fri • Jul 9 - 13, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Coney Island-bound [Q] trains run express from Prospect Park to Sheepshead Bay in Brooklyn


Trains stop at Church Av, Newkirk Plaza and Kings Hwy.

For service to Parkside Av, Beverley, Cortelyou Rds, Avenue H, Avenue J, Avenue M, Avenue U and Neck Rd, take the [Q] to Church Av, Newkirk Plaza, Kings Hwy or Sheepshead Bay and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [B]* or [Q].

For service from these stations, take the [B] or [Q] to Kings Hwy, Newkirk Plaza, Church Av or Prospect Park and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [Q].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.
